Shine Servers LLP is a privately held professional Indian based web hosting company founded in 2010. Shine Servers offers the most comprehensive range of secure, fully protected and private web hosting services in the world. All Shared, VPS & Dedicated Servers are located at Global Layer Datacenter in Netherlands.

Included with all VPS accounts:
- Fully-Managed
- 24/7 Support
- Free Migration
- Premium 24/7 Technical Support
- 100% Uptime Guarantee
- Extremely Secure Environment
- ZERO Overselling Guarantee


Payment Mode: PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Bitcoin, Altcoins & Payza
